info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 2:51PM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Otero County through 315 PM MDT... At 250 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Sacramento, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Timberon, Sacramento, Weed, Hay Canyon and Cox Canyon. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
